name: Dandy lion blooming
description: An animation of a character that is part lion and part flower reveals some of its anthropomorphic traits as it blooms. Created by hand, this stop motion puppet was made with wire, electrical tape, clay, seeds and bits of shell that happened to wash ashore. This unique character belongs to a set of over 80 original puppets created by Kathryn Ann Jankowski. www.katjankowski.com
